languages.text: {n}Воин в броне, украшенной знаком Инквизиции, ровным и сухим, словно бумага, голосом произносит:{/n} "Лорд-инквизитору известно о прибытии Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус на Футфол. Он допустил это, не отдавал приказа о преследовании и велел оказывать надлежащее уважение высокой персоне. Выношу предупреждение — суждения госпожи Чорда опасно склоняются к самоуправству и нарушению командной иерархии".

{n}The warrior clad in armour adorned with the sign of the Inquisition speaks in a voice that is even and dry like paper:{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor is aware of Rogue Trader von Valancius's arrival on Footfall. He allowed it and gave no order of persecution. Rather, the Lord Inquisitor's will is that Rogue Trader von Valancius be treated with respect befitting {mf|his|her} high status. In her assertions, Lady Chorda is coming dangerously close to abusing her authority and violating the chain of command. This is your warning."
languages.original_text: {n}Воин в броне, украшенной знаком Инквизиции, ровным и сухим, словно бумага, голосом произносит:{/n} "Лорд-инквизитору известно о прибытии Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус на Футфол. languages.text: {n}这一刻，身穿审判庭护甲的战士开了口。他的语气极其平淡，干涩如纸。{/n}“大审判官已经得知冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人来到了落脚港。大审判官大人允许这次造访，严禁任何人迫害行商浪人。不仅如此，大审判官大人还希望这位行商浪人能得到与{mf|他|她}崇高地位相称的尊重接见。库尔达女士的断言已经接近滥用职权、违反指挥系统的危险程度，这是对你的警告。”
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior clad in armour adorned with the sign of the Inquisition speaks in a voice that is even and dry like paper:{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor is aware of Rogue Trader von Valancius's arrival on Footfall. He allowed it and gave no order of persecution. Rather, the Lord Inquisitor's will is that Rogue Trader von Valancius be treated with respect befitting {mf|his|her} high status. In her assertions, Lady Chorda is coming dangerously close to abusing her authority and violating the chain of command. This is your warning."

traits.locale_text: {n}这一刻，身穿审判庭护甲的战士开了口，他的语气极其平淡，干涩如纸。{/n}“审判长已经得知冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人来到了落脚港。审判长大人允许这次造访，严禁任何人迫害行商浪人。不仅如此，审判长大人还希望这位行商浪人能得到{mf|他|她}崇高地位相称的尊重接见。库尔达女士的断言已经接近滥用职权、违反指挥系统的危险程度了，这是对你的警告。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}異端審問庁の印が付いた鎧に身を包んだ戦士は、紙のように乾ききった声で喋った。{/n}「ロード・インクィジターは、自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスがフットフォールに到着されたことをご存じです。彼はそれを許可し、迫害を命じませんでした。ロード・インクィジターはむしろ、自由開拓者、フォン・ヴァランシウスが高い身分ににふさわしい敬意のある扱いを受ける事を希望しております。チョーダ様の主張によると、チョーダ様は、職権乱用と命令系統違反に近づいているとのことです。これは警告です」
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior clad in armour adorned with the sign of the Inquisition speaks in a voice that is even and dry like paper:{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor is aware of Rogue Trader von Valancius's arrival on Footfall. He allowed it and gave no order of persecution. Rather, the Lord Inquisitor's will is that Rogue Trader von Valancius be treated with respect befitting {mf|his|her} high status. In her assertions, Lady Chorda is coming dangerously close to abusing her authority and violating the chain of command. This is your warning."

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問庁の印が付いた鎧に身を包んだ戦士は、紙のように乾ききった声で喋った。{/n}「ロード・インクィジターは、自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスがフットフォールに到着されたことをご存じです。彼はそれを許可し、迫害を命じませんでした。ロード・インクィジターはむしろ、自由開拓者、フォン・ヴァランシウスが高い身分ににふさわしい敬意のある扱いを受ける事を希望しております。チョーダ様の主張によると、チョーダ様は、職権乱用と命令系統違反に近づいているとのことです。これは警告です」
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}El guerrero ataviado con una armadura adornada con el símbolo de la inquisición habla con voz uniforme y seca.{/n} «El Lord Inquisidor está al tanto de la llegada {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius a Paso. Dejó que pasara y no dio ninguna orden de persecución, todo lo contrario, su deseo es que se trate con el debido respeto {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius. Con sus reivindicaciones, lady Chorda está prácticamente abusando de su autoridad y violando la cadena de mando. Se lo advierto».
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior clad in armour adorned with the sign of the Inquisition speaks in a voice that is even and dry like paper:{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor is aware of Rogue Trader von Valancius's arrival on Footfall. He allowed it and gave no order of persecution. Rather, the Lord Inquisitor's will is that Rogue Trader von Valancius be treated with respect befitting {mf|his|her} high status. In her assertions, Lady Chorda is coming dangerously close to abusing her authority and violating the chain of command. This is your warning."

traits.locale_text: {n}El guerrero ataviado con una armadura adornada con el símbolo de la inquisición habla con voz uniforme y seca.{/n} El Lord Inquisidor está al tanto de la llegada {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius a Paso. Dejó que pasara y no dio ninguna orden de persecución, todo lo contrario, su deseo es que se trate con el debido respeto {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius. Con sus reivindicaciones, lady Chorda está prácticamente abusando de su autoridad y violando la cadena de mando. Se lo advierto».
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}Der Krieger in der Rüstung mit dem Zeichen der Inquisition spricht in einer Stimme, die so glatt und trocken ist wie Papier:{/n} "Der Großinquisitor weiß von der Ankunft von {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} Valancius auf Footfall. Er hat sie gestattet und keinen Befehl erteilt, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} festzusetzen. Stattdessen ist es der Wille des Großinquisitors, dass {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} von Valancius mit dem Respekt behandelt wird, der {mf|seinem|ihrem} Status gebührt. Lady Chorda steht mit ihren Verkündigungen gefährlich knapp davor, ihre Macht zu missbrauchen und die Befehlskette zu verletzen. Dies ist Eure Warnung."
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior clad in armour adorned with the sign of the Inquisition speaks in a voice that is even and dry like paper:{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor is aware of Rogue Trader von Valancius's arrival on Footfall. He allowed it and gave no order of persecution. Rather, the Lord Inquisitor's will is that Rogue Trader von Valancius be treated with respect befitting {mf|his|her} high status. In her assertions, Lady Chorda is coming dangerously close to abusing her authority and violating the chain of command. This is your warning."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Krieger in der Rüstung mit dem Zeichen der Inquisition spricht in einer Stimme, die so glatt und trocken ist wie Papier:{/n} "Der Großinquisitor weiß von der Ankunft von {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} Valancius auf Footfall. Er hat sie gestattet und keinen Befehl erteilt, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} festzusetzen. Stattdessen ist es der Wille des Großinquisitors, dass {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} von Valancius mit dem Respekt behandelt wird, der {mf|seinem|ihrem} Status gebührt. Lady Chorda steht mit ihren Verkündigungen gefährlich knapp davor, ihre Macht zu missbrauchen und die Befehlskette zu verletzen. Dies ist Eure Warnung."
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}Le guerrier en armure ornée du symbole de l'Inquisition prend la parole d'une voix sèche :{/n} « Le seigneur inquisiteur est au courant de l'arrivée {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} von Valancius à Castel. Il autorise sa présence ici et n'a donné aucun ordre de persécution. Au contraire, il a demandé qu'{mf|il|elle} soit {mf|traité|traitée} avec tout le respect dû à son rang. Par ses assertions, dame Chorda frise l'abus de pouvoir et le non-respect de la hiérarchie. Vous voilà prévenue. »
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior clad in armour adorned with the sign of the Inquisition speaks in a voice that is even and dry like paper:{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor is aware of Rogue Trader von Valancius's arrival on Footfall. He allowed it and gave no order of persecution. Rather, the Lord Inquisitor's will is that Rogue Trader von Valancius be treated with respect befitting {mf|his|her} high status. In her assertions, Lady Chorda is coming dangerously close to abusing her authority and violating the chain of command. This is your warning."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le guerrier en armure ornée du symbole de l'Inquisition prend la parole d'une voix sèche :{/n} « Le seigneur inquisiteur est au courant de l'arrivée {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} von Valancius à Castel. Il autorise sa présence ici et n'a donné aucun ordre de persécution. Au contraire, il a demandé qu'{mf|il|elle} soit {mf|traité|traitée} avec tout le respect dû à son rang. Par ses assertions, dame Chorda frise l'abus de pouvoir et le non-respect de la hiérarchie. Vous voilà prévenue. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}Engizisyon sembolü işlenmiş zırhının içindeki savaşçı, kâğıt gibi net ve kuru bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Lord Engizisyoncu, Hür Tacir von Valancius'un Binliman'a gelişinden haberdardır. Kendisinin buna izni vardır ve şahsa zulmedilme emri vermemiştir. Bilakis Lord Engizisyoncu; Hür Tacir von Valancius'a, statüsüne uygun bir saygıyla davranılmasını dilemektedir. Leydi Chorda, iddiaları sırasında yetkisini kötüye kullanmaya ve emir komuta zincirini ihlal etmeye tehlikeli derecede yaklaşmaktadır. Bu bir uyarıdır."
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior clad in armour adorned with the sign of the Inquisition speaks in a voice that is even and dry like paper:{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor is aware of Rogue Trader von Valancius's arrival on Footfall. He allowed it and gave no order of persecution. Rather, the Lord Inquisitor's will is that Rogue Trader von Valancius be treated with respect befitting {mf|his|her} high status. In her assertions, Lady Chorda is coming dangerously close to abusing her authority and violating the chain of command. This is your warning."

traits.locale_text: {n}Engizisyon sembolü işlenmiş zırhının içindeki savaşçı, kâğıt gibi net ve kuru bir sesle konuşuyor:{/n} "Lord Engizisyoncu, Hür Tacir von Valancius'un Binliman'a gelişinden haberdar. Kendisinin buna izni vardır ve şahsa zulmedilme emri vermemiştir. Bilakis Lord Engizisyoncu, Hür Tacir von Valancius'a, statüsüne uygun bir saygıyla davranılmasını dilemektedir. Leydi Chorda, iddiaları sırasında yetkisini kötüye kullanmaya ve emir komuta zincirini ihlal etmeye tehlikeli derecede yaklaşmaktadır. Bu bir uyarıdır."
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent
